system.availability: A User that possesses this tome gains +30 to Forbidden Lore (Daemonology, Heresy, Psykers, and The Warp) Tests, but if they fail that test by more degrees than their Willpower Bonus, they gain one Corruption Point.
system.cost: A Tome containing forbidden knowledge surrounding servents of chaos, its words are useful, but can rot the minds of the weaker willed.
